recipesJson.name: Sour Apple Belts
recipesJson.author: humanpuck
recipesJson.description: First post on here.  I start with a 500 ML batch of 12.5 ML Nic, 467.5 ML VG and 20 ML distilled water.  I love sour apple belts so this is my attempt at a similar flavor and I've found it very enjoyable.  Its a sweet fruity flavor.  Note the Apple(tart Granny Smith) by TFA is actually Apple(Tart Green Apple) by TFA.
